summary: This document appears to be a Freedom of Information request regarding Jeffrey Epstein and his connections to Royal Air Force bases, specifically referencing a flight landing at RAF bases. The request was made in September 2019, indicating ongoing public interest in Epstein's travel patterns and potential military connections.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central subject of the Freedom of Information request regarding his connections to Royal Air Force bases and flight landings.

events.title: FOI Request Regarding Epstein and RAF Bases
events.description: A Freedom of Information request was made regarding Jeffrey Epstein's connections to Royal Air Force bases and flight landings.

keyFacts: A Freedom of Information request was made in September 2019 regarding Jeffrey Epstein's connections to Royal Air Force bases.
The request specifically mentions 'Fox Landing at RAF Bases', suggesting interest in flight patterns or landings.
The document indicates ongoing public and investigative interest in Epstein's travel and potential military connections.
